OOC: If I miss any attacks, just tell me and I will get them in the next
post.

BIC:

Megatron frowned as he saw the onslaught come towards him, he was to
suprised to react in time as the rockets smashed into his arm sending
his cannon flying away, and laser blasts from Alphay Dolphey smashing
into him as well, but before he could even scream in pain, Prowl was
upon him, and he fell before the great beasts weight, as talons began to
tear into his chest plate. Megatron looked up into the beasts face.
"Fight on Skullgrin, destroy these metal mongrels."  Then the water
pressure also streamed into him, (but I think it would hit Prowl as
well, cause you are on me, it might even protect me, so i will let you
post first robo)

Rumble had no idea of the Autobot rushing him, and the heavy impact sent
a creak through his armor as he yellped in pain. He lay twitching for a
moment underneath the protectobot, then slowly tried to grab his pistol
which was a few feet away from him.

Soundwave also had no idea of the attack from the Protectobots, luckily
Blade let him know what was happening, as his finely tuned sound
receiving devices picked up Blade's taunts before hand, he flew out of
the way, into the sky, and looked down. He pushed a button on his
shoulder, which caused an invisible jamming wave to emminate. (This will
jam any radio communications within the battlefield, other then to him)
but as soon as he hit the button, Alpha's firepower suprised him,
knocking him out of the sky.

Spasstik saw Soundwave blasted, and in mid air quickly changed his
coarse, landing on the ground gracefully, now lunging towards Alpha
Dolphey. He hissed in rage, and opened his maw, letting loose a sonic
howl, blasting the high frequency sound wave at the Maximal.
